programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Shortly after Jean and Dom attend a lecture on sacred relics at Sainte Victoire's Catholic church, the priest is stabbed in the back with a crucifix, and the relic is stolen.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Just as it seems Jean and Dom's relationship may be moving towards romance, his estranged wife reappears in town after a long absence and wants to make amends with her family.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: It's Christmas in the town of Sainte Victoire, and Jean is looking forward to spending it with her new friends.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jeremy trips over the dead body of a young woman after sleeping on the cruiser.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: A woman asks Jean to investigate the death of her actress mother, who was killed backstage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean and Dom help Caron solve a murder in a remote country mansion; love rolls into town for Gloria.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean has friends from England visiting Sainte Victoire; they seem to have someone on their trail, intent on making it a very short trip; the answer could lie in a mysterious pack of old Tarot cards.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: A musician is found dead with a head injury and a strange symbol drawn on his face; Jean and Dom try to unravel how the victim could have died alone in a locked room.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Antique dealer Jean White is embracing her new life and friends in France; she continues to be drawn into mysteries, from minor offenses to murder investigation; her late husband's killer remains at large, preparing to get revenge.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Judith and Jeremy arrange for the group to attend a murder-mystery night at a hotel with a spooky history; but when an actual murder takes place, a heavy rainstorm traps Jean inside with all the suspects.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: When a member of a marine exploration group suffers a cardiac arrest while searching the seabed, Caron enlists Jean's help to investigate whether the team of scientists were really combing for minerals or looking for buried treasure.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: After Gloria discovers the body of an unknown man with a fencing foil protruding from his chest, Jean delves into a tale of honor and the last ever duel to take place in Sainte Victoire, France.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Antiques dealer Jean White is nearly bankrupt after her husband's sudden death, and so she heads to their one last asset: a cottage in antiques hub Sainte Victoire, France.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: When designer Violet Oliver falls from a balcony at her fashion show and survives, Jean wonders whether it was an accident or foul play.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Antiques dealer Jean White is nearly bankrupt after her husband's sudden death, and so she heads to their one last asset: a cottage in antiques hub Sainte Victoire, France.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: To collect on a 30-year-old gambling debt, a gangster named Sonny threatens to pay Uncle Patrick a visit in Saint Victoire; to save Patrick, Jean must solve a riddle and unlock a rare treasure.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean and Dom investigate when a puppeteer is murdered after a Christmas Eve performance at a Sainte Victoire market; Judith receives a card from a former bridesmaid that contains a disturbing truth about her marriage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean and Dom investigate when a puppeteer is murdered after a Christmas Eve performance at a Sainte Victoire market; Judith receives a card from a former bridesmaid that contains a disturbing truth about her marriage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Jean White arrives in Sainte Victoire to prepare to sell her cottage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean learns from police chief Caron that her ring has been sent away as evidence, and that there is little they can do about the threats from Rory's mistress.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Judith and Jeremy's 80s-themed wedding anniversary party takes a gnarly turn when an attendee is discovered dead.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: When an elderly man is killed during a home robbery, Caron is confused to discover that, while there were many valuable pieces of art in the home, only one was taken.
